channel.title: Theiving Stalls
channel.description:
Ok probably easy for most of you but i'm actually struggling lol -
Theres not many ways of making cash on my server, So what i wanted to was add a theiving stall that gives you like 50k and some exp each time,
Anyone give me a detailed explanation on how to add this? I already tried a couple of things but was just getting errors when i compiled it :(
Thanks to whoever helps (++red) ~snaz.

item.title: Theiving Stalls
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:306253"][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=402136.msg2980299#msg2980299 date=1254578369]
You can’t Rep.

Anyways:

[code]public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(theifTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
setAnimation(emote);
sendMessage("You steal from the "+stallName);
sendMessage(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
theifTimer = delay;
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sendMessage(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}
}[/code]
Add that with any other Public Ints.

[code]case 2562:
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 50k”, 60, 125*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 4878:
TheifStall(“scimitar stall”, “and recieve 100k”, 20, 100*playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 4877:
TheifStall(“magic stall”, “and recieve 200k”, 40, 125*playerLevel[17], 995, 200000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 4876:
TheifStall(“general stall”, “and recieve 75k”, 1, 70*playerLevel[17], 995, 75000, 15, 0x340);
break;

case 2560:
TheifStall(“silk stall”, “and recieve 1000k”, 99, 20*playerLevel[17], 995, 1000000, 30, 0x340);
break;

case 2565:
TheifStall(“silver stall”, “and recieve 400k”, 80, 150*playerLevel[17], 995, 400000, 30, 0x340);
break;[/code]

That should be obvious where to place.
(If not, place with any other object cases.)

makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, 4877, Rotation, 10); // general stall makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, 4878, Rotation, 10); // scimitar stall makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, 4876, Rotation, 10); // magic stall makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, 2560, Rotation, 10); // silk stall makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, 2565, Rotation, 10); // silver stall makeGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, 2562, Rotation, 10); // gem stall

That’s entirely obvious.

Shouldn’t get any errors if you don’t fail.
[/quote]
So you just copy and pasted from your final devolution and spat out what you found?

@Thread

client.java:17203: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable theifTimer
location: class client
if(theifTimer == 0) {
   ^
client.java:17206: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
   sendMessage("You steal from the "+stallName);
   ^
client.java:17207: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
   sendMessage(message);
   ^
client.java:17210: cannot find symbol
symbol  : variable theifTimer
location: class client
   theifTimer = delay;
   ^
client.java:17213: cannot find symbol
symbol  : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
  sendMessage("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall.
");
  ^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Change the 'sendMessage’s to ‘sM’.
You’re also missing ‘thieftimer’.[/quote]

Actually no. That’s from my Czar Based Server. :l

I just took the bits I edited and gave it to him.

Read full topic

This needs finishing, else i can’t compile with an error
someone help me finish this last error please:(

thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Theiving Stalls
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

Just find your first click object method in client.java and add this;

case IDHERE: addskillxp(SKILLID, AMMOUTOFXP); additem(995,10000); break;

Self explanatory.

Read full topic

Theres not many ways of making cash on my server, So what i wanted to was add a theiving stall that gives you like 50k and some exp each time,

Anyone give me a detailed explanation on how to add this? I already tried a couple of things but was just getting errors when i compiled it

You can’t Rep.

Anyways:

[code]public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(theifTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {

[code]case 2562:
